text: @realDonaldTrump Fuck you!!!!!!!  U as president need to use the DPA to have labs in OUR COUNTRY manufacture hundreds of millions covid-19 and immunity Tests. Without them we are driving a car on the highway with our window shield painted black. We need test results ti know when we can open up.
